This research employs a mixed-method approach by combining qualitative and quantitative studies. The quantitative approach follows a cross-sectional study design. The quantitative part of this research is a large-scale survey to measure depression, anxiety, and burnout, capture general and health-related stressors, and infer the presence of state resilience. The qualitative approach follows a phenomenology study design. The qualitative part of this research comprises of focus-group discussion and semi-structured in-depth interview with key-opinion leaders.
